item.title: Why this website?
item.description: 1 - BEING VISIBLE Through this website and all contents relative to what I do and who I am, this place is the best resume I can provide (the summary is available on homepage). 2 - BEING FRIENDLY I share demos hosted here for recruiters, partners, developers. I didn’t want to display a 404 homepage, so previously I put an amazing meme instead: Previous version of thommil.com I found it very funny but feedbacks were not as good as expected!

item.title: My game engines
item.description: TL;DR My love affair with the game engines. The story of all the gamers who have become developers, from fantasy to disillusion. Full story One upon a time… My childhood was marked by several of the big names of video games: Wolfenstein 3D - John Carmack - 1992 Ultima 7 - Richard Garriott - 1992 Another World - Eric Chahi - 1991 If you want to know a little more about their work, go to Fabien Sanglard’s website.
